name: Super Monsters Ate My Condo+
summary:
Swipe to feed condos to monsters. Match the correct colors together and create combos to pull off insane score streaks. Feed the wrong condos to the wrong monster too many times and they will topple over your tower.

This is a version of the Super Monsters Ate My Condo remake exclusively for Apple Arcade. The microtransactions have been removed, but it requires a subscription to play.
